lines.text: Generally speaking, if I've eaten something I don't want to see it again.
I never met a man I didn't mutilate.
If I had all the money I'd spent on drink, I'd spend it on drink.
If a thing is worth doing, it is worth forcing someone else to do it.

[playing cards]
My dear Henry, if dirty fingers were trumps, what a splendid hand you'd have.
I don't know what I want, but I want it now!
I want my meat burned like Saint Joan.
